subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Eight Belles (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Larry Jones stopped training horses two years ago, but renewed health and a star filly, Havre de Grace, have him in the Breeders’ Cup Classic.
snippet: Larry Jones stopped training horses two years ago, but renewed health and a star filly, Havre de Grace, have him in the Breeders’ Cup Classic.
